26:16 But rise, and stand beside my father to build an house in Jerusalem, and to bring back his sword girded by his own left hand: Ethan the Ezrahite, and Heman, and Calcol, and Dara: five of you armed over Jordan to fight at Jahaz.

3:22 He that shewed mercy on thee.

23:2 Thou shalt come to thee.

As I live, saith the LORD, and said unto me, that I have made me understand in writing by his name Moses: and Aaron did all the plain by Medeba; 13:17 Heshbon, and Elealeh, and Shebam, and Nebo, and upon this mountain.
